website_summaries.verdict: The best way to add a fully functional gaming controller to most Android smartphones.
pros: Telescopic design adjusts to different sizes of smartphones, eliminating most compatibility issues
Buttons are easy to access with the thumbs without straining
Offers eight hours of continuous play
cons: Largest phones may not fit in the telescopic cradle without sitting vertically

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR PUBG
customer_reviews.text: I cant really review the controller because I wasnt even able to use it. PUBg no longer allows the app being opened from 3rd party apps (which is necessary to use this controller) otherwise your account will be banned. So ... its kinda useless. In the brief moments I got to play before getting banned, the controls seemed fine, but I didnt have much time to really play around with the settings and what not.
customer_reviews.author: Furoidozo

customer_reviews.title: Thumbsticks Beware
customer_reviews.text: A great controller with excellent buttons until you discover that the sticks aren't calibrated right. They have dead zones along the edges. As long as you go straight forward, back, left, or right, you'll be fine. What does this mean with games? Well, try to run any direction other than the listed above and your character will agonizingly walk, the game thinking the stick isn't fully tilted, even though it physically is. Disappointing that an otherwise great product would be ruined by such a flaw. If you want to play older games that don't rely on a thumbstick, then this is the controller for you.

It's just kinda shoved in there and had some hard folds also probably too long. Took it apart and managed to get lights and all the buttons working. But the thumbstick is dead so in the bin it goes. Took apart the wee model to figure out how to put this one back together. That model is better built but this model has l3 + r3 buttons. Your mileage may vary.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Santa
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a co-worker as part of a secret santa, at the opening, it was the highlight of the exchange. In reality, it didn't work out and looked cheap, embarrassingly. There are multiple modes but none of them linked up correctly to any of the top ~30 Android games that were available on the Google Play store. Most of the times the controls were partially or completely unresponsive, or pathed incorrectly (i.e you'd turn the joystick right, and the vehicle or player would turn right, then you'd turn it left and it would still turn right) Multiple games, over a dozen tried, not a single one worked correctly. Samsung Galaxy S9, and my own Pixel 4. Embarrassed, disappointed

feature_bullets: Compatible with Android/IOS System : This mobile phone game controller compatible with android system 6.0 or above devices with 2 kinds of modes:Direct Play Mode and Android Standard Mode.【NOTICE】the controller working with ios11.0 / ios12 / ios13 system devices with Direct Play Mode. BUT NOT COMPATIBLE WITH IOS 13.4 system,please make sure your device above IOS 11.0 system but under IOS 13.4 system before purchase.

Support 2 Different Modes: Android Standard Mode only support on Android system devices,no need any other settings just connect and play on this mode,but only support few games.Direct Play Mode both support on Android and IOS system device.Support much more games on this mode and support remapping the buttons on “Shooting Plus V3” APP.

Mobile Phone Dimension Limits: Fit for the vast majority of mobile phones in the market. The maximum length limit for the mobile phone devices is 6.2 inch, please make sure the length of your phone within 6.2 inch before purchase just in case it can not be fitted for the extendable game controller.

TURBO Function: the 8 action buttons(A/B/X/Y/L1/R1/L2/R2) can be manually set TURBO function, after the game controller slept,turned off or restart,the previous TURBO settings will be be cleared and needs to be reset it again.

Warm Tips: Please charge the controller about 5-8 hours before first operation, and it is necessary to read the user manual carefully before any operation. If it doesn`t work with the games on Android Standard Mode, please reconnect the controller with your phone to Direct Play Mode and try again.
